attributes.action: Decree a State Funeral For Mr. Harry Patch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the words of Her Majesty the Queen, " We Will Never Forget The Bravery And Enormous Sacrifice of his Generation".

And as such, we the people of the United Kingdom, should commemorate and celebrate his, Henry Allingham and Bill Stone's passing with the honour of a full State funeral.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
